dcterms:creator: Wojciech Zaremba
Ilya Sutskever
Oriol Vinyals
dcterms:description: A standard benchmark dataset in the field of language modeling, consisting of 887,521 tokens (words) in total, making it a small dataset where overfitting is a considerable concern.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank

dcterms:creator: Bo Pang
Lillian Lee
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of 5000 film reviews used for sentiment analysis, where consecutive segments of words are extracted from each review and the corresponding film score is used as the observed output.
dcterms:title: Cornell film reviews corpus
